mechanics.trigger: While Barkskin spell is active on target
mechanics.condition: Target's calculated Armor Class (AC) is less than 16
mechanics.outcome: Target's Armor Class (AC) is set to 16

description_text: You touch a willing creature. Until the spell ends, the target's skin has a rough, bark-like appearance, and the target's AC can't be less than 16, regardless of what kind of armor it is wearing.
